TaskDescription.Detail: Compress and decompress the directory containing the files.

Assist.value: Checks if directory 'C:\\sampleDir' exists and stores it in variable 'this.isDirExist'.
Enter the variable 'this.isDirExist' to store the existence of the directory.
Enter the directory path 'C:\\sampleDir' to check for existence.
Check the condition for creating the directory (the existence of directory 'C:\\sampleDir').
Enter the condition that the directory does not exist 'this.isDirExist == false'.
Create directory 'C:\\sampleDir'.
Enter the directory path 'C:\\sampleDir' to be created.
Repeat the CreateDirectory inside as many times as the input condition (10 times).
Enter 'this.fileCount = 0' as the initial value.

Check the initial value entered in the initialize property and enter the number of times to repeat (the number of files to be created). Since the initial value is 0 , enter 'this.fileCount < 10' to create 10 files.
Enter 'this.fileCount++' to increase the count by 1 each time it is executed.
Create directory 'C:\\sampleDir'.
Enter the file to be created, including the path. In order to avoid duplication, the file is input using the number of repetitions ('C:\\sampleDir\\sampleText'+this.fileCount+'.txt').
Get a list of files that exist in directory 'C:\\sampleDir'.
Enter the variable 'this.fileList' to store the file list.
Enter the directory path 'C:\\sampleDir' to get the list of files from.
Display a list of files present in directory 'C:\\sampleDir' as a message box.
Enter the variable 'this.fileList' where the list of files to be displayed as a message box is stored.
Compress the 'C:\\sampleDir' directory to create a compressed file in the 'C:\\sampleDir' path.
Select the 'Directory' to compress.
Enter the directory path 'C:\\sampleDir' to compress.
Enter the directory path 'C:\\sampleDir' where the compressed file will be created.
Get the list of files that exist in the 'C:\\sampleDir' directory and check that the 'C:\\sampleDir\\sampleDir.zip' file has been added.
Enter the variable 'this.fileList' to store the file list.
Enter the directory path 'C:\\sampleDir' to get the list of files from.
Display a list of files present in directory 'C:\\sampleDir' as a message box.
Enter the variable 'this.fileList' where the list of files to be displayed as a message box is stored.
Unzip the compressed file 'C:\\sampleDir\\sampleDir.zip'.
Enter the zip file path 'C:\\sampleDir\\sampleDir.zip' to unzip.
Enter the directory path 'C:\\sampleDir' to extract.
Get a list of files that exist in directory 'C:\sampleDir\sampleDir'.
Enter the variable 'this.fileList' to store the file list.
Enter the directory path 'C:\\sampleDir\\sampleDir' to get the list of files from.
Displays a list of files present in directory 'C:\\sampleDir\\sampleDir' as a message box.
Enter the variable 'this.fileList' where the list of files to be displayed as a message box is stored.
Delete the 'C:\\sampleDir' directory.
Enter the directory path to be deleted 'C:\\sampleDir'.
